title.rendered: Wallaroo Genuine Leather Phone Card Holder Pocket For iPhone and Android Smartphones (Robin’s Egg Pastel Blue Leather)

content.rendered:
Colour Name:Pastel Blue Leather

The concept that your playing cards must be held to your telephone is not new. A current pattern makes telephone card holders a standard giveaway, however they’re often made with low cost silicone, or weak elastic. If wallets that go in your pocket are made out of leather-based, why aren’t the wallets that connect to your smartphone? Wallaroo, Inc. hand-makes advantageous leather-based wallets for attaching to telephones. We consider that in the event you’ve spend a whole lot on a premium telephone, why connect an affordable silicone stick-on pockets to be seen by everybody? Wallaroo wallets are made of top quality leather-based similar to a premium leather-based pockets. Your pockets spends all day in your pocket, however your telephone is proven to everybody, so we consider it is time to present folks that you simply care about luxurious. Wallaroo is the classiest telephone card holder available on the market. Rich, real leather-based stitched with sturdy threading, Wallaroo matches the posh of a standard pockets, with the comfort of a stick on pockets. Whether iPhone, Samsung, HTC, Google Pixel, or another telephone, the huge array of coloration choices can match any smartphone. Define your aura of sophistication with Wallaroo, and depart a budget silicone card holders and elastic stick on card holders behind. Works nice for Orchid Gray Samsung S8 Phones!

Make certain this matches by coming into your mannequin quantity.
REAL LEATHER – Made with Rich, Luxurious Leather
COMPATIBLE WITH NEARLY EVERY SMARTPHONE AND CASE – Compatible with: iPhone 7 Plus, iPhone 7, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, Samsung Galaxy S6, S5, S4, S3, Galaxy Note 5, 4, 3 , LG, Nexus, HTC, Sony Xperia and many many extra! Works with almost ANY telephone case together with: Spigen, Otterbox, Lifeproof, Belkin, Speck, and Apple! Any telephone or case with a width of two.5 inches / 6.4 cm. Does not match iPhone 5 or SE.
BUILT TO LAST – Strong 3M Adhesive retains Wallaroo Attached Firmly to your Phone
SECURE FIT FOR YOUR CARDS – Non-Slip Interior Grip retains Cards Firmly Within Wallaroo
LEAVE THE WALLET AT HOME – Whether you are going to the seashore, the bar, or the fitness center, depart your pockets behind, and solely carry the necessities like your ID, bank card, and money.
